comment._content:
It would be very useful to know the date of the photographs
all show so clearly the destruction of man and time and 
what Egypt was like before westerners brought it back to life. JV

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: part of the issue is we just don't know exactly, so we've marked these as "about 1900" to give a general idea. there is a bit more info here: www.brooklynmuseum.org/research/digital-collections/lante...

comment.author: 69376572@N00
comment._content: the goddess - Hathor- face chipped away in the 8th century by manic coptic christians, the paint work still visible on the (famous) zodiac of Denerah www.flickr.com/photos/lilacbonzai/503730606/in/set-721576...
